findings.title: User ETHER Units instead of Large Digits
findings.description: Using Ether units can enhance readability by avoiding multiplication with 10^18 while assigning token allocation amounts to State Variables.

findings.title: Redundant Require Statement Check
findings.description: The constructor of the TycoonToken contract includes a require statement at Line 783 that validates that the total token allocations are as expected. However, since the token allocation amounts are already initialized and hard-coded in the contract’s State variables itself, the require statement does not hold much significance and affects the gas optimization of the contract.
